articles.title: Trump’s motorcade in Florida rerouted due to ‘suspicious object’
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — President Donald Trump’s motorcade took a different route than usual to the airport as he was departing Florida on Sunday due to a “suspicious object,” according to the White House. The object, which the White House did not describe, was discovered during security sweeps in advance

articles.title: Allegiant to Buy Sun Country in Deal Valued at $1.5 Billion
